description: Modifies the parameters of a cache parameter group to the engine or system default value. You can reset specific parameters by submitting a list of parameter names. To reset the entire cache parameter group, specify the ResetAllParameters and CacheParameterGroupName parameters.

parameters.name: CacheParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the cache parameter group to reset.

parameters.name: ResetAllParameters
parameters.description: If true, all parameters in the cache parameter group are reset to their default values. If false, only the parameters listed by ParameterNameValues are reset to their default values. Valid values: true | false.

parameters.name: ParameterNameValues
parameters.description: An array of parameter names to reset to their default values. If ResetAllParameters is true, do not use ParameterNameValues. If ResetAllParameters is false, you must specify the name of at least one parameter to reset. (dict) --- Describes a name-value pair that is used to update the value of a parameter. ParameterName (string) --- The name of the parameter. ParameterValue (string) --- The value of the parameter.
